Example galleryÂ¶

This gallery features several notebooks demonstrating the usage of Maui and various possible interactions that users might encounter with the generated visualizations.

Please note that Maui is designed to be utilized within an IPython notebook. The links below showcase some examples illustrating the usage and interaction possibilities within Google Colab.
